attributes.action: Britian to leave European Court of Human Rights
attributes.additional_details: The single violation of an ECHR found in 2024 concerned the right to freedom of speech we dont need them we have always been a freedom of speech this needs to stop and we dont need ECHR who dont accept our values and  country
attributes.background: The single violation of an ECHR found in 2024 concerned the right to freedom of expression.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Hold a referendum to decide if the UK should leave the ECHR.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700614

It was also created using an incomplete name. People who create petitions are required to give their full, real name.
